name: Crew of One
description:
ALTERNATE AIMING AND DRIVING OF YOUR TANK WHILE SURVIVING WAVES OF ENEMIES! USE YOUR MOUSE TO EITHER AIM THE TURRET OR CONTROL THE TRACKS. WATCH OUT FOR PITS AND HAZARDS. 

MADE FOR GMTK GAME JAM 2020, THE THEME WAS "OUT OF CONTROL".

IT IS RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION, IT WILL RUN FASTER THAN ON THE WEB. IF ON THE WEB, USE FULL SCREEN MODE.

TRY TO BEAT OUR DEVELOPER HIGH SCORES:

CADEN - 3270

THOMAS - 2980

ZACK - 2920

EMILIO - 2750
